name: bun-actionhero-backend
description: Bun Actionhero - the greatest framework for building web applications, and other applications too!

scripts.prepare: bun run prepare-backend && bun run prepare-frontend
scripts.test: bun run test-backend && bun run test-frontend
scripts.lint: bun run lint-backend && bun run lint-frontend
scripts.pretty: bun run pretty-backend && bun run pretty-frontend
scripts.ci: bun run lint && bun run build && bun test
